content:
Build a FlexCard in the FlexCard Designer by dragging elements from the Build panel onto the canvas. Each element can be styled and properties configured within the Designer.

Drag elements from three sections in the Build panel:

Fields: Display data fields generated from the FlexCard's data source.
Display: Add elements that displays information, such as a Chart, Datatable, and Custom LWC element.
Inputs: Add input elements to enable users to enter data or select from a list of options.

Add Elements to a FlexCard

* Style an element and configure its properties in the FlexCard Designer
* Select up to six actions to launch or update an OmniScript, navigate to a web page or application, display a flyout, fire an event, or update data field values
* Add conditions to display or hide data based on the value of a data field

FlexCards Display Elements Reference and FlexCards Input Elements Reference are available.

Add Actions to a FlexCard

* Launch or update an OmniScript
* Navigate to a web page or application
* Display a flyout
* Fire an event
* Update data field values
title: Building and Customizing FlexCards
